ingredients.ingredient: 2 tablespoons honey, or more to taste
1 pinch ground cinnamon, or more to taste

cookingTips: Heat coconut oil in covered pot over medium-high heat before adding kernels
Shake pot frequently to prevent burning and ensure even coating
Drizzle warm popcorn with honey and toss immediately while kernels are warm for better coating adhesion
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the user understand stovetop popcorn popping technique and discuss portion control for healthy snacking.
